entry.title: Monday: A few flurries. High plus 3.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this afternoon then mainly cloudy. Fog patches dissipating early this afternoon. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 5.
